content: Hey Everyone, I wanted to get started on the issue #41(https://github.com/opencax/GSoC/issues/41) , so could anyone point me to a prior commit on how to get started on this project

Ah, @Prabhat Singh so you will also want to realize that OpenCAx is an umbrella organization for a variety of different projects. As you can see at https://opencax.github.io there are four main projects under that umbrella, all related to CAD but involving different code and different mentors.
issue #41 is for IfcOpenShell, so if you're interested in that project, you'll want to join their forum and introduce yourself, which you can get to at https://opencax.github.io
@Sean Thanks a lot for the clarifications...I will do it :big_smile:
